channel.title: Dog Food Recipes on Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Dog Food Recipes on Docs

item.title: Homemade Dog Food Recipe
item.description: This recipe makes enough food for a medium-sized dog for one week. Adjust the portions according to your dog’s size and dietary needs. Ingredients 1 pound ground turkey 1 cup brown rice 1 cup chopped carrots 1 cup chopped green beans 1 tablespoon fish oil 1/4 teaspoon salt Instructions In a large pot, cook the ground turkey over medium heat until browned. Add the brown rice, carrots, green beans, fish oil, and salt to the pot.

item.title: Shadow's Food Recipe
item.description: This recipe makes enough food for a medium-sized dog for one week. Adjust the portions according to your dog’s size and dietary needs. Ingredients 1 pound boneless chicken breasts 1 cup sweet potatoes 1/2 cup peas 2 cups white rice 8 oz cheddar cheese Instructions In a large pot, boil the chicken over medium heat until it reaches an internal temperature of 165Â°F. Use a shredder to shred the cooked chicken.
